item.title: 문제
item.description:
#java #신한 #김동훈 #김현진진 #정교영영 #이수민 #황지원원

정수 배열 numbers가 매개변수로 주어집니다. numbers의 각 원소에 두배한 원소를 가진 배열을 return하도록 solution 함수를 완성해주세요.


언어 : #java
알고리즘 : 구현 알고리즘

class Solution { public int[] solution(int[] numbers) { int[] answer = {}; return answer; } } Copy


#신한
package src; class Shinhan { public int[] solution(int[] numbers) { int[] answer = new int[numbers.length]; for (int i = 0; i < numbers.length; i++) { answer[i] = numbers[i] * 2; } return answer; } } Copy
#김동훈
package src; class Shinhan { public int[] solution(int[] numbers) { int[] answer = new int[numbers.length]; for (int i = 0; i < numbers.length; i++) { answer[i] = numbers[i] * 2; } return answer; } } Copy
#김현진진
package src; class Shinhan { public int[] solution(int[] numbers) { int[] answer = new int[numbers.length]; for (int i = 0; i < numbers.length; i++) { answer[i] = numbers[i] * 2; } return answer; } } Copy
#정교영영
package src; class Shinhan { public int[] solution(int[] numbers) { int[] answer = new int[numbers.length]; for (int i = 0; i < numbers.length; i++) { answer[i] = numbers[i] * 2; } return answer; } } Copy
#이수민
package src; class Shinhan { public int[] solution(int[] numbers) { int[] answer = new int[numbers.length]; for (int i = 0; i < numbers.length; i++) { answer[i] = numbers[i] * 2; } return answer; } } Copy
#황지원원
package src; class Shinhan { public int[] solution(int[] numbers) { int[] answer = new int[numbers.length]; for (int i = 0; i < numbers.length; i++) { answer[i] = numbers[i] * 2; } return answer; } } Copy
